verbs.description: [ARG0: I] [V: love] [ARG1: Nancy Pelosi] . She is a progressive hero and a legislative wizard , holding the Democratic caucus together for monumental achievements like the ACA and solid opposition to horrible Trump policies . I love her indifference to the rabid Republicans ...
